name: alien-local-filesystem-links
author: austrALIENsun
description: Scans pages for file:/// links and makes it possible to open them with the system's file browser (e. g. Windows Explorer).

preferences.name: excludeUrlStartsWithList
preferences.title: Exclude 'Start with' URIs (space separated list)
preferences.description: If the URI of the current page starts with one of the URIs listed here it will be ignored when scanning for filesystem links. For example if you put 'file:/// http://mozilla.org/about' in the text box then all local pages and all pages that start with 'http://mozilla.org/about' will be ignored.
